description:
Join over 1,000 students from 92 countries learning how to be a consultant and leaving the drudgery of employment behind! This highly rated, information-packed course will help you decide if consulting is right for you, and teach you how to successfully start a consulting business.

For the past 18 years I have been a consultant who has created 6 highly profitable consulting businesses in many different fields.

My consulting career has enabled me to:

  • Live where I want to live
  • Work from home and not commute
  • Do work that I love
  • Do work that has meaning
  • Balance work and leisure
  • AND make a great income

This course is not based on theory. It is born of real world experience gained from years of consulting. By spending about 90 minutes in this course you will have a crystal clear understanding of how to be a consultant including the following:

  • Whether or not consulting the right career option for you
  • What the risks of starting a consulting business are, and how you can successfully manage those risks
  • How to set up and run your own consulting business

This class also includes the following powerful resources for your use to help you become a consultant:

  • A proven tool to identify the kinds of work you are passionate about
  • Step-by-step instructions on how to use Google to determine if there is demand for your consulting services, and exactly how to position yourself in the marketplace
  • A spreadsheet that will enable you to calculate your financial runway for launching your consulting business, and how to manage the finical risk involved
  • How to acquire the skills you need to deliver your services with excellence
  • Links to 55 organizations of consultants that you can team up with to get your business off the ground
  • Actual templates for all the documents you need to successfully run your consulting business
  • And much, much more!

Don't let fear of the unknown stop you from pursing a rewarding career in consulting. You have my personal guarantee that this course will help you make the leap or you can get a full refund from Udemy. Overcome your fears and set sail toward a bright future by enrolling in this outstanding course on how to be a consultant!
title: How to be a Consultant: A Simple Plan for Consulting Success
